text: Geoff Nicholls (22 September 1919 – 24 September 1997) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood and Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1919 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Fitzroy Football Club players
title: Geoff Nicholls (footballer)
